"Resta Signs": "Resta Signs are items you can find out in the field. If you register them to your Subpalette, you can use them to recover HP."

"Resta Signs aren't the only things you can register to your Subpalette. You can also register other recovery items, as well as Class Skills.

You can unlock the ability to customize your Subpalette by progressing through the main story."

"Use <%SubPaletteLeft> and <%SubPaletteRight> to move the Subpalette cursor, then use <%SubPalette> to activate the selected slot.
If playing with a keyboard, you can also use the number keys to activate Subpalette slots directly."
